author: Xavier Oró
content:
Hello,
my company is looking for several C++ developers. If anybody is interested, or you know someone looking for a C++ job, send me the CV at xavier@allinea.com and I will forward it to my boss.
We are based in UK.

You can see all the open positions in https://www.allinea.com/careers

We develop development tools (a debugger and profiler) for supercomputers.

If you have any question don't hesitate to ask (by email)

Best regards,


PD: Manuel, are you sure that you don't want to return to the C++ dark side? :P Un abrazo.
